text: Volodymyr Bezubyak (; born 23 March 1957 in Lviv) is a former Ukrainian and Soviet football coach as well as former professional midfielder. ==Career== In early 2016, he worked a senior coach performed functions of de facto senior team head coach for FC Karpaty Lviv along with Oleh Luzhny who was head coach de jure. ==References == ==External links== * Profile at Official FC Metalurh Site (Rus) * Profile at FFU Official Site (Ukr) Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Lviv Category:Lviv State University of Physical Culture alumni Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Soviet football managers Category:FC Karpaty Lviv players Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi players Category:Lviv State University of Physical Culture faculty Category:FC Karpaty-2 Lviv managers Category:Ukrainian Premier League managers Category:FC Karpaty Lviv managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Volodymyr Bezubyak
